component.name: LPG Board
component.purpose: Used for interfacing all the components that make up the LPG

properties.property: I2C channel for connecting the sink node (RSS2 mote)
RTC interface for connecting the DS3231 RTC clock
SD card module interface for connecting the SD Card module
TP4056 port for interfacing the TP4056 charging protection circuit
Switch for turnning on or off the whole LPG
Power male pins for providing power ports for other components

component.description: The LPG Board is a custom made board for WIMEA-ICT Low power gateway. It is purposely for interfacing the LPG comonents.
